## Pre-flight Checklist

- [ ] I have searched existing issues and this bug has not been reported yet
- [ ] I am using the latest version of SelfWorld
- [ ] I have checked the logs for relevant error messages

## Bug Description

A clear and concise description of the bug.

## Steps to Reproduce

1. Run command '...'
2. In channel '...'
3. With configuration '...'
4. See error

## Expected Behavior

What you expected to happen.

## Actual Behavior

What actually happened. Include error messages or log output if available.

- **Node.js version**: (e.g., 18.20.0)
- **Discord.js version**: (e.g., 14.15.3)
- **MySQL version**: (e.g., 8.0.36)
- **OS**: (e.g., Ubuntu 22.04, Windows 11)
- **SelfWorld version/commit**: (e.g., v0.1.0 or commit hash)
